name: Pirate's Dice
description:
Take revenge on the crew that betrayed ye' in a fateful game of Pirate's Dice!

Made during GMTK Jam July 2022 based on 'Roll of the Dice" theme.

WASD to move

Left Click to Shoot

R to reload your gun

F to peg-leg-kick

Reloading throws a red dice that gives you a new gun, based on it's roll!

Kill skeletons and find treasure for points. And yes, there's a leaderboard!

How high a score can ye get?

----------

**Disclaimer**

Most 3D assets are from Synty Studios.

All code, 2D graphics, & audio was made from scratch during the jam.
